{"id":603735942,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1639870115,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/603735942/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Word Abbreviation","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool validWordAbbreviation(string word, string abbr) {\n        int w =0;\n        int a =0 ;\n        while(w<word.size() && a<abbr.size()){\n           if(abbr[a] =='0'){\n               return false;\n           }\n            int num =0 ;\n            while(a < abbr.size() && isdigit(abbr[a])){\n                num = num *10+ abbr[a]-'0';\n                a++;\n            }\n            if(num!=0){\n                w += num;\n            }\n            else{\n                if(word[w]!=abbr[a]){\n                    return false;\n                }\n                w++;\n                a++;\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return w == word.size() && a == abbr.size();\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-word-abbreviation"}
